junk_bolt.name: Bolt
junk_bolt.description: A common bolt used to detect anomalies. Every stalker carries some.

medkit.name: Medkit
medkit.description: Basic medical supplies to treat wounds and restore health.

medkit_army.name: Army Medkit
medkit_army.description: Military-grade medical supplies with improved healing properties.

medkit_scientific.name: Scientific Medkit
medkit_scientific.description: Advanced medical kit developed by Zone scientists. Highly effective.

vodka.name: Vodka
vodka.description: A bottle of vodka. Reduces a small amount of radiation but also impairs coordination.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: A loaf of bread. Restores some stamina.

canned_food.name: Canned Food
canned_food.description: Preserved food that remains edible in the Zone's harsh conditions.

energy_drink.name: Energy Drink
energy_drink.description: Caffeinated beverage that boosts energy temporarily.

detector_basic.name: Echo Detector
detector_basic.description: Basic anomaly and artifact detector. Low range but reliable.

detector_advanced.name: Bear Detector
detector_advanced.description: Advanced detector that can locate more valuable artifacts.

detector_veles.name: Veles Detector
detector_veles.description: Cutting-edge artifact detector with exceptional range and accuracy.

fort_pistol.name: Fort-12 Pistol
fort_pistol.description: Ukrainian 9x18mm pistol with good stopping power.

sawed_off.name: Sawed-off Shotgun
sawed_off.description: Double-barrel 12-gauge with shortened barrels. Deadly at close range.

toz34.name: TOZ-34 Shotgun
toz34.description: Double-barrel hunting shotgun with longer range.

ak74.name: AK-74
ak74.description: Standard 5.45x39mm assault rifle. The Zone's workhorse.

abakan.name: AN-94 Abakan
abakan.description: Advanced Russian assault rifle with 2-round burst capability.

svd.name: SVD Dragunov
svd.description: Semi-automatic sniper rifle with excellent accuracy.

gauss.name: Gauss Rifle
gauss.description: Experimental electromagnetic weapon. Extremely powerful and accurate.

leather_jacket.name: Leather Jacket
leather_jacket.description: Basic protection favored by rookies. Offers minimal protection.

stalker_suit.name: Stalker Suit
stalker_suit.description: Standard protective suit balancing protection and mobility.

ssp_suit.name: SSP-99 Ecologist Suit
ssp_suit.description: Scientific suit with exceptional anomaly and radiation protection.

exo.name: Exoskeleton
exo.description: Heavy military exoskeleton with the best physical protection available.

mutant_part_bloodsucker.name: Bloodsucker Tentacles
mutant_part_bloodsucker.description: Tentacles harvested from a bloodsucker. Valuable to scientists and collectors.

mutant_part_snork.name: Snork Foot
mutant_part_snork.description: The powerful, springy foot of a snork. Sought after for its unique tissue structure.

mutant_part_pseudodog.name: Pseudodog Tail
mutant_part_pseudodog.description: The tail of a pseudodog, said to contain special glands with unusual properties.

mutant_part_chimera.name: Chimera Claw
mutant_part_chimera.description: The deadly claw of a chimera. Extremely rare and valuable.

mutant_part_controller.name: Controller Brain
mutant_part_controller.description: The brain of a controller, still exhibiting strange psionic activity.

mutant_part_burer.name: Burer Hand
mutant_part_burer.description: The hand of a burer, which still twitches with residual telekinetic energy.

mutant_part_flesh.name: Flesh Eye
mutant_part_flesh.description: The eye of a flesh mutant. Common but still has scientific value.

mutant_part_boar.name: Boar Hoof
mutant_part_boar.description: The hoof of a mutated boar, hardened by radiation.

mutant_part_poltergeist.name: Poltergeist Essence
mutant_part_poltergeist.description: A strange glowing substance harvested from a poltergeist. Highly unstable.

mutant_part_pseudogiant.name: Pseudogiant Heart
mutant_part_pseudogiant.description: The massive heart of a pseudogiant. Extremely valuable to researchers.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: A spherical artifact that generates heat.
effects: Emits heat that can keep you warm

crystal_thorn.name: Crystal Thorn
crystal_thorn.description: A crystalline artifact formed in thermal anomalies.

droplets.name: Droplets
droplets.description: Solidified drops of molten material that emit heat.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: A heavy artifact that generates electrical energy.

sparkler.name: Sparkler
sparkler.description: An artifact that emits electrical discharges.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: A highly energetic artifact that creates light.

stone_flower.name: Stone Flower
stone_flower.description: A mineral formation from gravitational anomalies.

night_star.name: Night Star
night_star.description: A rare artifact that bends light and gravity.

soul.name: Soul
soul.description: A mysterious artifact that seems to hover in place.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: A gelatinous artifact that absorbs chemicals.

jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
jellyfish.description: A translucent artifact with chemical properties.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: A mucus-like artifact that neutralizes toxins.

brain.name: Brain
brain.description: A pulsating artifact that affects psionic fields.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: A luminescent artifact that manipulates mental states.

compass.name: Compass
compass.description: An artifact that seems to distort space around it.

medusa.name: Medusa
medusa.description: A common electrical artifact formed in electro anomalies.

stone_blood.name: Stone Blood
stone_blood.description: An artifact with healing properties, formed in chemical anomalies.
